mapper.select: SELECT b.title,b.abstractContent,b.labelId,b.classificationId,b.createTime,b.userId, tc.classificationName,b.id as blogId,b.suolueTu, u.username, t.clickNum, tl.labelName FROM tb_blog b INNER JOIN tb_classification tc ON tc.classificationId=b.classificationId INNER JOIN tb_user u ON u.id=b.userId INNER JOIN tb_label tl ON tl.labelId=b.labelId INNER JOIN tb_click t ON t.blogId=b.id ORDER BY b.createTime DESC
